statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeAvailability
SELECT employee_id, start_time, end_time FROM EmployeeAvailability WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday'
SELECT start_time, end_time, day_of_week, employee_id FROM EmployeeAvailability WHERE end_time > '10:00:00'
SELECT employee_id, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM EmployeeAvailability WHERE start_time < '08:00:00' AND end_time > '17:00:00'
SELECT DISTINCT day_of_week FROM EmployeeAvailability ORDER BY day_of_week DESC
SELECT employee_id, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM EmployeeAvailability WHERE employee_id = 1 AND day_of_week = 'Monday'
SELECT * FROM EmployeeAvailability WHERE day_of_week IN ('Monday', 'Tuesday') ORDER BY employee_id ASC, day_of_week DESC
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) as availability_count FROM EmployeeAvailability GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2
SELECT DISTINCT day_of_week FROM EmployeeAvailability WHERE start_time >= '08:00:00' AND end_time <= '17:00:00'
SELECT AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, start_time, end_time)) as average_availability FROM EmployeeAvailability
SELECT * FROM employee_availability WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT day_of_week FROM employee_availability;
SELECT employee_id, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM employee_availability ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT preferred_day, preferred_shift FROM schedule_preferences WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM employee_availability WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT * FROM employee_availability WHERE employee_id = 123 AND day_of_week = 'Monday'
SELECT employee_id, start_time, end_time FROM employee_availability ORDER BY start_time ASC
SELECT employee_id, preferred_day, preferred_shift FROM schedule_preferences WHERE preferred_shift = 'Morning'
SELECT * FROM employee_availability WHERE day_of_week = 'Friday' OR day_of_week = 'Saturday'
SELECT employee_id, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM employee_availability WHERE employee_id IN (456, 789)
SELECT * FROM EmployeeAvailability;
SELECT employee_id, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM EmployeeAvailability WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, position FROM EmployeeDetails WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_id, preferred_schedule_time FROM SchedulePreferences ORDER BY priority DESC;

SELECT * FROM EmployeeAvailability WHERE start_time < '12:00:00'
SELECT employee_id, preferred_schedule_time FROM SchedulePreferences ORDER BY priority DESC
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM EmployeeDetails WHERE department = 'IT'
SELECT employee_id, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM EmployeeAvailability WHERE employee_id = 123
SELECT MAX(priority) AS max_priority FROM SchedulePreferences
SELECT * FROM employee_availability;
SELECT employee_id, day_of_week FROM employee_preferences WHERE work_shift = 'Morning';
SELECT employee_id, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM schedule ORDER BY day_of_week DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, employee_id, start_time, end_time FROM schedule WHERE employee_id = 101 AND day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT * FROM work_shifts WHERE start_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM schedule WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT schedule_id, start_time, end_time FROM schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_availability WHERE day_of_week = 'Friday' AND start_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT employee_id, preferred_day_off FROM employee_preferences WHERE work_shift = 'Morning';
SELECT * FROM Employee_Availability;
SELECT employee_id, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM Employee_Schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT employee_id, reason FROM Employee_Leave ORDER BY leave_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee_Preferences WHERE preferred_shift_start < '12:00:00';
SELECT employee_id, job_title FROM Employee_Employment WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM Employee_Employment WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_id, job_title FROM Employee_Employment WHERE manager_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT leave_id, leave_date, reason FROM Employee_Leave WHERE leave_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT e.employee_id, e.job_title, p.preferred_day_of_week FROM Employee_Employment e JOIN Employee_Preferences p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id;
SELECT s.employee_id, s.day_of_week, s.shift_start, a.start_time FROM Employee_Schedule s JOIN Employee_Availability a ON s.employee_id = a.employee_id WHERE s.day_of_week = a.day_of_week;
